by users","params":{"_ticketNumbers":": array of ticket numbers between 10,000 and 19,999"}},"calculateTotalPriceForBulkTickets(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_numberTickets":"number of tickets to buy","_priceTicket":"price of one ticket (in Degis)"}},"changeRandomGenerator(address)":{"details":"The calls to functions are used to verify the new generator implements them properly. It is necessary to wait for the VRF response before starting a round. Callable only by the contract owner","params":{"_randomGeneratorAddress":": address of the random generator"}},"claimAllTickets(uint256)":{"details":"Callable by users only, not contract!","params":{"_lotteryId":": lottery id"}},"claimTickets(uint256,uint256[])":{"details":"Callable by users only, not contract!","params":{"_lotteryId":": lottery id"}},"closeLottery(uint256)":{"details":"Callable only by the operator","params":{"_lotteryId":": lottery round"}},"constructor":{"details":"RandomNumberGenerator must be deployed prior to this contract","params":{"_degisTokenAddress":": address of the DEGIS token (for buying tickets)","_randomGeneratorAddress":": address of the RandomGenerator contract used to work with ChainLink VRF","_usdcTokenAddress":": address of the USDC token (for prize distribution)"}},"drawFinalNumberAndMakeLotteryClaimable(uint256,bool)":{"details":"Callable only by the operator","params":{"_autoInjection":": reinjects funds into next lottery ","_lotteryId":": lottery round"}},"injectFunds(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Callable by owner(incentive) or injector address(insurancePool income) First transfer USDC and then call this function to record","params":{"_amount":": amount to inject ","_lotteryId":": lottery round"}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"recoverWrongTokens(address,uint256)":{"params":{"_tokenAddress":": the address of the token to withdraw","_tokenAmount":": token amount to withdraw"}},"redeemTickets(uint256[])":{"details":"Callable by users","params":{"_ticketIds":": array of ticket ids"}},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"setMaxNumberTicketsPeyBuyOrClaim(uint256)":{"details":"Only callable by the owner"},"setMinAndMaxTicketPrice(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Only callable by the owner","params":{"_maxPriceTicketInDegis":": maximum price of a ticket in Degis","_minPriceTicketInDegis":": minimum price of a ticket in Degis"}},"setOperatorAndTreasuryAndInjectorAddresses(address,address,address)":{"details":"Only callable by the owner","params":{"_injectorAddress":": address of the injector","_operatorAddress":": address of the operator","_treasuryAddress":": address of the treasury"}},"startLottery(uint256,uint256,uint256[4],uint256)":{"details":"Callable only by operator","params":{"_endTime":": endTime of the lottery (timestamp in s)","_priceTicketInDegis":": price of a ticket in DEGIS","_rewardsBreakdown":": breakdown of rewards per bracket (must sum to 10,000)(100 <=> 1)","_treasuryFee":": treasury fee (10,000 = 100%, 100 = 1%) (set as 0)"}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"viewClaimAllTickets(uint256)":{"details":"Callable by users only, not contract!","params":{"_lotteryId":": lottery id"}},"viewLottery(uint256)":{"params":{"_lotteryId":": lottery id"}},"viewNumbersAndStatusesForTicketIds(uint256[])":{"params":{"_ticketIds":": array of _ticketId"}},"viewRewardsForTicketId(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Computations are mostly offchain. This is used to verify a ticket!","params":{"_lotteryId":": lottery round","_ticketId":": ticket id"}},"viewUserInfoForLotteryId(address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_cursor":": cursor to start where to retrieve the tickets","_lotteryId":": lottery round","_size":": the number of tickets to retrieve","_user":": user address"}}},"version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"buyTickets(uint32[])":{"notice":"Buy tickets for the current lottery round"},"calculateTotalPriceForBulkTickets(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Calculate price of a set of tickets"},"changeRandomGenerator(address)":{"notice":"Change the random generator contract address"},"claimAllTickets(uint256)":{"notice":"Claim all winning tickets for a lottery"},"claimTickets(uint256,uint256[])":{"notice":"Claim a set of winning tickets for a lottery"},"closeLottery(uint256)":{"notice":"Close a lottery"},"constructor":{"notice":"Constructor"},"drawFinalNumberAndMakeLotteryClaimable(uint256,bool)":{"notice":"Draw the final number, calculate reward in Degis for each group,  and make this lottery claimable (need to wait for the random generator)"},"injectFunds(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Inject funds"},"recoverWrongTokens(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Recover wrong tokens sent to the contract, only by the owner All tokens except Degis and USDC are wrong tokens"},"redeemTickets(uint256[])":{"notice":"Redeem tickets for all lottery"},"setMaxNumberTicketsPeyBuyOrClaim(uint256)":{"notice":"Set max number of tickets that a user can buy/claim at one time"},"setMinAndMaxTicketPrice(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Set the upper/lower limit of the ticket price"},"setOperatorAndTreasuryAndInjectorAddresses(address,address,address)":{"notice":"Set operator, treasury, and injector addresses"},"startLottery(uint256,uint256,uint256[4],uint256)":{"notice":"Start the lottery"},"viewClaimAllTickets(uint256)":{"notice":"Claim all winning tickets for a lottery"},"viewCurrentLotteryId()":{"notice":"View current lottery id"},"viewLottery(uint256)":{"notice":"View lottery information"},"viewNumbersAndStatusesForTicketIds(uint256[])":{"notice":"View ticker statuses and numbers for an array of ticket ids"},"viewRewardsForTicketId(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"View rewards for a given ticket, providing a bracket, and lottery id"},"viewUserInfoForLotteryId(address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"View user ticket ids, numbers, and statuses of user for a given lottery"}},"version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"project:/contracts/DegisLottery.sol":"DegisLottery"},"evmVersion":"byzantium","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":1000},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"@openzeppelin/contracts/access/Ownable.sol":{"keccak256":"0x1cae4f85f114ff17b90414f5da67365b1d00337abb5bce9bf944eb78a2c0673c","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://d5ff16b336ce8f906478d5f2eecc6435e00833bdc0b92f6b209cf9e92cb5b2b7","dweb:/ipfs/QmRD1rAZEqQ73C33cdA3QoUyBDMEWnNKNMc6PNkAZWHeQQ"]},"@openzeppelin/contracts/security/ReentrancyGuard.sol":{"keccak256":"0x1278c76b840063ff5e14a2d7c5707812c1eabc2342ed040bf862c2d7552102fe","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://b9989233808b8f475395f71ea757e277fa167cdac8a24d10f9784783defd313c","dweb:/ipfs/Qmdg6rbPsShpnzvqKmPVuFk7eYU53oXTPxqUJXd9WLD4vg"]},"@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/IERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0xf8e8d118a7a8b2e134181f7da655f6266aa3a0f9134b2605747139fcb0c5d835","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://9ec48567e7ad06acb670980d5cdf3fd7f3949bf12894f02d68c3bb43e75aa84f","dweb:/ipfs/QmaG3R2J9cz92YT77vFjYrjMNU2wHp4ypwYD62HqDUqS5U"]},"@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/utils/SafeERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0x99f5c21018d796db7833a2100bb0e7411999e248a3c950fb526eee5d2bf47cb7","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://b31b80dd57f8c28320b01fa4f3ed98ac1aa678f61846c1db2771c996b77a9451","dweb:/ipfs/QmcT2Di5L9t82A9XdYDZ4tWMEPGFVFazKDwC2Vrd135AA3"]},"@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/Address.sol":{"keccak256":"0x069b2631bb5b5193a58ccf7a06266c7361bd2c20095667af4402817605627f45","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://6a4c96fafff76deda5697c3c5c98cade6e6e1b178254544c106bf360c079ce4e","dweb:/ipfs/QmXmxubE3jnatFgZuN8ay1VV6hZ8WRmhvUjNpeVjki15HX"]},"@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/Context.sol":{"keccak256":"0xf930d2df426bfcfc1f7415be724f04081c96f4fb9ec8d0e3a521c07692dface0","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://fc2bfdea0d2562c76fb3c4cf70a86c6ba25c5a30e8f8515c95aafdf8383f8395","dweb:/ipfs/QmTbFya18786ckJfLYUoWau9jBTKf documentation.text: @notice Calculate all awards
@notice Check if an address is a contract

params._ticketNumbers: : array of ticket numbers between 10,000 and 19,999

changeRandomGenerator(address).details: The calls to functions are used to verify the new generator implements them properly. It is necessary to wait for the VRF response before starting a round. Callable only by the contract owner

claimAllTickets(uint256).details: Callable by users only, not contract!

claimTickets(uint256,uint256[]).details: Callable by users only, not contract!

constructor.details: RandomNumberGenerator must be deployed prior to this contract

params._degisTokenAddress: : address of the DEGIS token (for buying tickets)
params._randomGeneratorAddress: : address of the RandomGenerator contract used to work with ChainLink VRF
params._usdcTokenAddress: : address of the USDC token (for prize distribution)

injectFunds(uint256,uint256).details: Callable by owner(incentive) or injector address(insurancePool income) First transfer USDC and then call this function to record

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._tokenAddress: : the address of the token to withdraw

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._maxPriceTicketInDegis: : maximum price of a ticket in Degis
params._minPriceTicketInDegis: : minimum price of a ticket in Degis

params._endTime: : endTime of the lottery (timestamp in s)
params._priceTicketInDegis: : price of a ticket in DEGIS
params._rewardsBreakdown: : breakdown of rewards per bracket (must sum to 10,000)(100 <=> 1)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

viewClaimAllTickets(uint256).details: Callable by users only, not contract!

viewRewardsForTicketId(uint256,uint256).details: Computations are mostly offchain. This is used to verify a ticket!

params._cursor: : cursor to start where to retrieve the tickets
params._size: : the number of tickets to retrieve

buyTickets(uint32[]).notice: Buy tickets for the current lottery round

calculateTotalPriceForBulkTickets(uint25.notice: Calculate price of a set of tickets

changeRandomGenerator(address).notice: Change the random generator contract address

claimAllTickets(uint256).notice: Claim all winning tickets for a lottery

claimTickets(uint256,uint256[]).notice: Claim a set of winning tickets for a lottery

drawFinalNumberAndMakeLotteryClaimable(u.notice: Draw the final number, calculate reward in Degis for each group,  and make this lottery claimable (need to wait for the random generator)

recoverWrongTokens(address,uint256).notice: Recover wrong tokens sent to the contract, only by the owner All tokens except Degis and USDC are wrong tokens

setMaxNumberTicketsPeyBuyOrClaim(uint256.notice: Set max number of tickets that a user can buy/claim at one time

setMinAndMaxTicketPrice(uint256,uint256).notice: Set the upper/lower limit of the ticket price

setOperatorAndTreasuryAndInjectorAddress.notice: Set operator, treasury, and injector addresses

viewClaimAllTickets(uint256).notice: Claim all winning tickets for a lottery

viewNumbersAndStatusesForTicketIds(uint2.notice: View ticker statuses and numbers for an array of ticket ids

viewRewardsForTicketId(uint256,uint256).notice: View rewards for a given ticket, providing a bracket, and lottery id

viewUserInfoForLotteryId(address,uint256.notice: View user ticket ids, numbers, and statuses of user for a given lottery
